topic.title: Exercise: pivo003 - Turnover, travel expenses and commission

section.p: For each salesman the following information is stored in the worksheet: Month, Region, Saleman, Sales, Expenses and Commission.

Create one pivot table with which you get an overview of the total sales, expenses and commission per month and per salesman with a possibility to filter per region. All values should have a currency format with no decimals.

body.section:
Solution
Report Filter Column Labels Row Labels Values
Region Month Salesman Sales Expenses Commission
Drag the field Values from Column Labels to Row Labels under Salesman.
/>
Change Number Format in Accounting with 0 decimals.
